content: अवरुद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Obstructed, stopped, checked, hindered. {@--2@} Shut up or in, enclosed. {@--3@} {%Incognito%}, disguised; अस्ति कश्चिद्राजसूनुरवरुद्धश्चरन् <ls>Dk.</ls>; अवरुद्धोऽचरत्पार्थो वर्षाणि त्रिदशानि च <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} Protected, and not seen by others; <ls>Y. 2. 290</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 236.</ls> {@--5@} Imprisoned, secluded as in the inner apartments.
